meanings.definition: The quality of being a skilled craftsman or craftswoman.
meanings.sent1: Her artisanships in woodworking were evident in the intricate details of the furniture she made.
meanings.sent2: The town's market showcased various artisanships, from pottery to jewelry making.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of artisanships, he attempted to build a birdhouse with comical results.
meanings.sent4: The artisanships of the chef transformed simple ingredients into culinary masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The artisanships of the seamstress were so refined that every stitch was a work of art.

meanings.definition: The work or products of artisans.
meanings.sent1: Visiting the artisan market, one could admire the diverse artisanships on display.
meanings.sent2: The artisanships of the blacksmith were highly sought after for their quality and durability.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a collection of ancient artisanships, showcasing the evolution of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent4: The artisanships of the weavers created beautiful tapestries that adorned the castle walls.
meanings.sent5: The artisanships of the potter were evident in the delicate designs of the ceramic vases.
